name: Plushie Bomber (itch)
description:
You know what's one time use ? Bombs.

-Blast your way through hordes of cute-evil plushies!

-Iceman doesn't have any weapons but he can catch bombs thrown at him and launch them back! 

-Smooth, hand-drawn frame by frame, crisp, pixel art animations!

We strongly recommend you play the downloadable Windows version with a controller for best experience.
